des: Create.mcp_server_settings.json file in the data directory, you can select the MCP service below, or you can add a new MCP service yourself.
We will continue to test and supplement the easy-to-use MCP services in the future, and everyone is welcome to add them together.
Remember to delete the comment line, the des attribute is only an explanation and will not be parsed.
des and link attributes are only for illustrating the installation method, so that everyone can view the original link, not required.
Currently, three transmission modes are supported: stdio (standard input and output), sse (Server-Sent Events), and streamable-http (streaming HTTP).

streamable-http-mcp-server.des: Web deployment in production using Streamable HTTP transport mode
